title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 November 2016 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:02 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:02 <vmassol1> ok bot should be ok again, it was hijacked by another server…  
12:02 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
13:52 <zzeroo> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
15:40 <sorinello> Hello @vmassol. Are you around ?  
15:41 <vmassol> sorinello: Hi, I'm here  
15:44 <sorinello> vmassol, I saw a thread on the devlist regarding some issues with certain yahoo emails [Lots of disabled Yahoo email addresses on the xwiki.org lists]. I have a problem with my gmail account on the userlist, but it seems to be a different one and I didn't want to hijack or pollute the thread  
15:46 <sorinello> This is the second time I get an email like this: http://pastebin.com/GBPTTG7L  
15:46 <vmassol> yep  
15:46 <vmassol> that's the same problem  
15:47 <sorinello> ok, just wanted to let you guys know .. so seems gmail is also affected  
15:47 <sorinello> sorry for the noise :)  
15:47 <vmassol> I don't really know how to fix this. Sergiu suggested some ideas on the list but it's not been acted on yet  
15:47 <vmassol> I'm sorry for the trouble  
15:48 <sorinello> no problem, the fix is jost one click away. The only inconvenience is that if users do not check regularly their emails, they will not get any mails from userlist until they click the link  
15:48 <vmassol> yes, I'm sure we lost a lot of subscribers because of this :(  
16:50 <msmeria> has quit  
17:08 <woshilapin> has quit  
17:09 <edvorg> has quit  
17:10 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
17:10 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki
